Description: BigIQ Template for use with F5 FPS labs https://clouddocs.f5.com/training/community/

Label.default: For First Accept BIG-IQ BYOL Terms and Conditions and note Image ID [v6.0.1]
Check "Outputs" for setup details after completion

BigIqAdminPassword.default: Big-IQ setup Admin password for GUI/Web Access

VPC.ConstraintDescription: This must be an existing VPC within the working region.

CustomImageId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid AMI Id
CustomImageId.Description: Please specify the a v6.x.latest AMI Id that you have Agreed to T&Cs [N.VA=ami-06f4512c73253cfce; SYD=ami-069b21b3347773840]

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type for BIG-IQ
InstanceType.Description: Size of the F5 BIG-IQ Instance |'m4.2xlarge' has 8 cores, 32Gb RAM @~50cents/hour

licenseKey1.Description: F5 BIG-IQ Central Manager license key

licenseKey2.Description: F5 BIG-IQ Logging Node license key

BigIqAdminPassword.Description: Big-IQ setup Admin password for GUI/Web Access

sshKey.Description: Key pair for accessing the instance. See, https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-key-pairs.html

ManagementSubnet.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC

SelfIPSubnet.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC
SelfIPSubnet.Description: Internal Subnet - used for data transfer

CmManagementIP.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP in the form x.x.x.x
CmManagementIP.Description: CM Management IP - Lab Default is 10.1.1.249

CmSelfIPAddr.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP in the form x.x.x.x
CmSelfIPAddr.Description: CM SelfIP IP - Lab Default is 10.1.20.249

DcdManagementIP.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP in the form x.x.x.x
DcdManagementIP.Description: DCD Management IP - Lab Default is 10.1.1.248

DcdSelfIPAddr.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP in the form x.x.x.x
DcdSelfIPAddr.Description: DCD SelfIP IP - Lab Default is Internal vlan 10.1.20.248

TimeZone.Description: Olson TimeZone string from /usr/share/zoneinfo eg: America/Los_Angeles

restrictedSrcAddress.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
restrictedSrcAddress.Description: The IP address range used to SSH and access managment GUI on the EC2 instances

NetworkInterfaces.Description: BIG-IQ CM Instance Data Plane NIC

Fn::Join: echo "DCD - About to License, Set password, Create vlan and set Self-ip. Should take about 5 min"
ETH1_MAC=`ifconfig eth1 | egrep HWaddr | awk '{print tolower($5)}'`
tmsh modify auth user admin password ${BIGIQ_PWD}
# PREP DOWNLOADED INPUT TEMPLATE FILE AND CREATE VLAN
##PREP DOWNLOADED INPUT TEMPLATE FILE AND CREATE SELFIP##
##SELF-IP PORTS AS PER SUPPORT ARTICLE K15612##

#!/bin/bash
FILE=/tmp/firstrun.log
if [ ! -e $FILE ]
 then
     touch $FILE
     nohup $0 0<&- &>/dev/null &
     exit
fi
#################################
function checkF5Ready {
     sleep 5
     while [[ ! -e '/var/prompt/ps1' ]]
 do
     echo -n '.'
     sleep 5
done 
sleep 5
STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/ps1`
while [[ ${STATUS}x != 'NO LICENSE'x ]]
 do
     echo -n '.'
     sleep 5
     STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/ps1`
done
echo -n ' '
while [[ ! -e '/var/prompt/cmiSyncStatus' ]]
 do
     echo -n '.'
     sleep 5
done 
STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/cmiSyncStatus`
while [[ ${STATUS}x != 'Standalone'x ]]
 do
     echo -n '.'
     sleep 5
     STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/cmiSyncStatus`
done
}


function checkStatusnoret {
sleep 10
STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/ps1`
while [[ ${STATUS}x != 'Active'x ]]
 do
     echo -n '.'
     sleep 5
     STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/ps1`
done
}
#################################
exec 1<&-
exec 2<&-
exec 1<>$FILE
exec 2>&1
checkF5Ready
sleep 20
tmsh modify auth user admin password $ADMIN_PASSWORD
tmsh modify sys dns name-servers add {10.0.0.2}
sleep 20
tmsh save /sys config
checkStatusnoret
echo "Setting hostname: $HOSTNAME"
tmsh modify /sys global-settings hostname $HOSTNAME
tmsh mv cm device bigip1 $HOSTNAME
tmsh modify sys ntp timezone "$TZ"
tmsh modify sys db setup.run value false
tmsh save /sys config

NetworkInterfaces.Description: BIG-IQ DCD Instance Data Plane NIC

BigIqCmEipAddress.Description: IP address of the management port on BIG-IQ

BigIqCmManagementPrivateIp.Description: Internal IP of Management Interfcae on BIG-IQ

BigIqDcdEipAddress.Description: IP address of the management port on BIG-IQ

BigIqDcdManagementPrivateIp.Description: Internal IP of Management Interfcae on BIG-IQ

BigiqAdminPassword.Description: To change run 'modify auth password admin' at CLI

NextSteps.Description: ssh to DCD then CM run ./setup-xxx-runme-xxx.sh
